SELECT jnl01_cont_id AS jnl01ContId ,jnl01_seq AS jnl01Seq ,jnl01_dr_acnt_cd AS jnl01DrAcntCd ,jnl01_dr_amt AS jnl01DrAmt ,jnl01_cr_acnt_cd AS jnl01CrAcntCd ,jnl01_cr_amt AS jnl01CrAmt ,opr01_cont_date AS opr01ContDate ,jnl12_tr_nm AS opr01TrNm ,fnd01_fund_nm AS fnd01FundNm ,itm01_item_nm AS itm01ItemNm ,dr.jnl10_acnt_nm AS drJnl10AcntNm ,cr.jnl10_acnt_nm AS crJnl10AcntNm ,dr.jnl10_acnt_cd AS drJnl10AcntCd ,cr.jnl10_acnt_cd AS crJnl10AcntCd FROM jnl01_journal AS j INNER JOIN opr01_cont ON opr01_cont_id = j.jnl01_cont_id INNER JOIN jnl12_tr ON jnl12_tr_cd = opr01_tr_cd INNER JOIN fnd01_fund ON fnd01_fund_cd = opr01_fund_cd INNER JOIN itm01_item ON itm01_item_cd = opr01_item_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN jnl10_acnt AS dr ON jnl01_dr_acnt_cd = dr.jnl10_acnt_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN JNL10_acnt AS cr ON jnl01_cr_acnt_cd = cr.jnl10_acnt_cd WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY jnl01_cont_id ASC , jnl01_seq ASC ,opr01_fund_cd
